concept.title: Installing the Hibernate Cache Module
concept.shortdesc: The Hibernate module is included in the installation package.

ol.li: If you have not done so, download and install Hibernate. supports Hibernate 3.3 and later (up to version 3.6.10) for use with the Hibernate Cache module. does not currently support Hibernate 4.x for use with the Hibernate Cache module.

The Hibernate module is included in the installation package. You can find the module in the <product_dir>/tools/Modules directory, in a zip file that includes the version and the string Hibernate. <product_dir> is the location where you installed .

Make sure that <product_dir>/lib/geode-dependencies.jar is part of the CLASSPATH when you run Hibernate. Alternatively, you can place the geode-dependencies.jar in a location that is accessible to your Hibernate application.
